languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Веабос-6 молит о вашей помощи! Нечто ужасное бродит по планете и ищет способ истребить ее обитателей. Сначала гибли маленькие группы, и все списывали на случайности — отравление, разбившийся транспорт, пожар. Однако число жертв росло, и их уже невозможно было списывать на совпадения. Враг будто пробует разные методы истребления ваших слуг, отыскивая самый эффективный и массовый. В захват пикт-ловушек иногда попадает размытая темная тень, ходящая меж людей, но никто не видел ее".

"Lord Captain, Vheabos VI begs for help! Something terrible prowls the planet, searching for a way to wipe out the planet's inhabitants. Victims died in small groups at first, so they dismissed it as simple accidents — a poisoning, a crashed transport, a fire. But the death toll has started to rise, and explaining everything as mere coincidence is no longer an option. The enemy appears to be testing out different methods of killing your subjects, like it's looking for the most efficient way to murder as many of them at once as possible. Our pict-traps sometimes catch sight of a blurry dark shadow walking among the people, but no one has actually seen it with their own eyes."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Веабос-6 молит о вашей помощи! Нечто ужасное бродит по планете и ищет способ истребить ее обитателей. Сначала гибли маленькие группы, и все списывали на случайности — отравление, разбившийся транспорт, пожар. Однако число жертв росло, и их уже невозможно было списывать на совпадения. traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Vheabos-VI prays for your help! I do not know how it is possible, but the world... has started to lose days. Across the entire planet, people go to sleep at the usual time , and wake up... a few days — or even weeks — later, according to the calculations of the chrono-cogitators."

"Lord Captain, Vheabos-VI prays for your help! I do not know how it is possible, but the world... has started to lose days. Across the entire planet, people go to sleep at the usual time , and wake up... a few days — or even weeks — later, according to the calculations of the chrono-cogitators."

languages.text: “舰长大人，维博斯六号星请求援助！某种可怕的东西在那颗行星上徘徊，打算把行星上所有居民全部杀光。一开始只死了一小批人，人们也只把这一切当成简单的意外，像是中毒、交通事故、火灾之类的，但随着死亡人数逐渐爬升，发生的事情无法再以巧合解释。敌人似乎在测试各种不同的方法来杀死你的臣民，就像是想找出哪种方法更高效一样。我们的视讯监视器有时会捕捉到模糊的黑影在人群中走动，但没人真正亲眼看到过它。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Vheabos VI begs for help! Something terrible prowls the planet, searching for a way to wipe out the planet's inhabitants. Victims died in small groups at first, so they dismissed it as simple accidents — a poisoning, a crashed transport, a fire. But the death toll has started to rise, and explaining everything as mere coincidence is no longer an option. The enemy appears to be testing out different methods of killing your subjects, like it's looking for the most efficient way to murder as many of them at once as possible. Our pict-traps sometimes catch sight of a blurry dark shadow walking among the people, but no one has actually seen it with their own eyes."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¡Vheabos VI pide ayuda! Algo terrible merodea por el planeta, buscando la forma de acabar con sus habitantes. Al principio, las víctimas morían en pequeños grupos, por lo que lo descartaron como simples accidentes: un envenenamiento, un transporte accidentado, un incendio. Pero el número de muertos ha empezado a aumentar, y explicarlo todo como una mera coincidencia ya no es una opción. El enemigo parece estar probando distintos métodos para matar a sus súbditos, como si buscara la forma más eficaz de asesinar al mayor número posible de ellos a la vez. Nuestras fototrampas a veces captan la visión de una sombra oscura y borrosa caminando entre la gente, pero nadie la ha visto realmente con sus propios ojos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Vheabos VI begs for help! Something terrible prowls the planet, searching for a way to wipe out the planet's inhabitants. Victims died in small groups at first, so they dismissed it as simple accidents — a poisoning, a crashed transport, a fire. But the death toll has started to rise, and explaining everything as mere coincidence is no longer an option. The enemy appears to be testing out different methods of killing your subjects, like it's looking for the most efficient way to murder as many of them at once as possible. Our pict-traps sometimes catch sight of a blurry dark shadow walking among the people, but no one has actually seen it with their own eyes."

Nuestras fototrampas a veces captan la visión de una sombra oscura y borrosa caminando entre la gente, pero nadie la ha visto realmente con sus propios ojos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ヴィアボス・VIが助けを求めています！恐ろしい何かがこの惑星を徘徊し、この惑星の住民を一掃する方法を探しています。最初になくなったのは小集団の犠牲者だったため...中毒死とか、輸送機の墜落とか、火災などの単純な事故として処理されました。しかし、死者の数は増え始め、すべてを単なる偶然の事故と説明することができなくなっています。敵は被験者を殺すさまざまな方法を試しているようで、できるだけ多くの対象者を一度に殺す最も効率的な方法を探しているように思えます。私たちのピクトトラップは、民の間を歩いてゆくぼんやりとした黒い影を捉えることはありますが、実際に目で見た者はいません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Vheabos VI begs for help! Something terrible prowls the planet, searching for a way to wipe out the planet's inhabitants. Victims died in small groups at first, so they dismissed it as simple accidents — a poisoning, a crashed transport, a fire. But the death toll has started to rise, and explaining everything as mere coincidence is no longer an option. The enemy appears to be testing out different methods of killing your subjects, like it's looking for the most efficient way to murder as many of them at once as possible. Our pict-traps sometimes catch sight of a blurry dark shadow walking among the people, but no one has actually seen it with their own eyes."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Vhéabos-VI nous appelle encore à l'aide ! Quelque chose d'abominable y rôde, une créature qui semble chercher un moyen d'éradiquer la population. Au début, les victimes mouraient par petits groupes et on a mis ça sur le compte d'accidents ponctuels : empoisonnements, accidents, incendies... mais le nombre de morts a commencé à s'accroître et il est devenu impossible de croire à simples coïncidences. Ce monstre semble tester les différentes méthodes que nous utilisons pour tuer les nôtres, comme s'il cherchait la façon la plus efficace d'assassiner d'un coup le plus de monde possible. Certains de nos pièges à pictocapture montrent parfois une ombre noire se déplaçant au milieu de la foule, mais personne ne l'a réellement vue de ses yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Vheabos VI begs for help! Something terrible prowls the planet, searching for a way to wipe out the planet's inhabitants. Victims died in small groups at first, so they dismissed it as simple accidents — a poisoning, a crashed transport, a fire. The enemy appears to be testing out different methods of killing your subjects, like it's looking for the most efficient way to murder as many of them at once as possible. Our pict-traps sometimes catch sight of a blurry dark shadow walking among the people, but no one has actually seen it with their own eyes."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Vhéabos VI nous appelle encore à l'aide ! Quelque chose d'abominable y rôde, une créature qui semble chercher un moyen d'éradiquer la population. Au début, les victimes mouraient par petits groupes et on a mis ça sur le compte d'accidents ponctuels : empoisonnements, accidents, incendies... mais le nombre de morts a commencé à s'accroître et il est devenu impossible de croire à simples coïncidences. Ce monstre semble tester les différentes méthodes que nous utilisons pour tuer les nôtres, comme s'il cherchait la façon la plus efficace d'assassiner d'un coup le plus de monde possible. Certains de nos pièges à pictocapture montrent parfois une ombre noire se déplaçant au milieu de la foule, mais personne ne l'a réellement vue de ses yeux. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Vheabos-VI bittet um Hilfe! Etwas Grauenhaftes pirscht auf dem Planeten umher und sucht nach Wegen, seine Bewohner auszulöschen. Anfangs sind die Opfer in kleinen Gruppen gestorben, die Vorfälle wurden als Unfälle abgetan — eine Vergiftung, ein abgestürzter Transporter, ein Feuer. Doch die Zahl der Opfer ist immer weiter angestiegen, es lässt sich nicht mehr einfach alles als Zufall abtun. Der Feind scheint verschiedene Methoden zu testen, wie er Eure Untertanen töten kann. Als würde er nach der effizientesten Methode suchen, möglichst viele gleichzeitig zu ermorden. Unsere Vid-Fallen erfassen manchmal einen verschwommenen dunklen Schatten, der unter den Leuten wandelt, aber niemand hat ihn je mit eigenen Augen gesehen."

Our pict-traps sometimes catch sight of a blurry dark shadow walking among the people, but no one has actually seen it with their own eyes."
